title: Printer prints lines/banding
keywords: line band streak horizontal vertical ghost smear faint
steps:
1. Clean encoder strip with 90% isopropyl
2. Run 3 cleaning cycles
3. Replace printhead if needed

title: HP printer faint print
steps: Use genuine ink → Run Clean Printhead Level 2 in HP Smart app

title: Printer prints blank pages
steps:
1. Remove tape from cartridges
2. Deep clean 3×
3. Soak printhead 15min
4. Replace drum (laser)

title: Laptop/PC no power
keywords: no power dead won’t turn start black
steps:
1. Hold power 40s
2. Charger only
3. Reseat RAM
4. CMOS reset
5. Test PSU

title: iPhone disabled
steps: Put in recovery mode → Restore via computer (data lost)

title: Wi-Fi connected no internet
steps:
Run in admin cmd:
ipconfig /release
ipconfig /renew
ipconfig /flushdns
netsh winsock reset
Restart

title: Fridge not cooling
steps:
1. Clean condenser coils
2. Check evaporator fan
3. Replace start relay ($25)
4. Compressor dead = new fridge

title: RTX GPU artifacts
steps:
1. Downclock 200MHz
2. Replace thermal pads
3. Bake 195°C 8min
4. VRAM dead

title: Windows boot loop
steps: Force shutdown 3× → Startup Repair → Command Prompt → bootrec /fixmbr → /fixboot → /rebuildbcd
